topics.name: Arrays
topics.description: Understands basic operations like traversing and sorting but struggles with advanced operations like dynamic array resizing.

topics.name: Stack
topics.description: Has a strong grasp of LIFO operations and can implement custom stacks but struggles with implementing stacks using arrays.

topics.name: Queue
topics.description: Comfortable with FIFO operations and understands circular queues but has trouble implementing priority queues.

topics.name: Tree
topics.description: Understands tree structures and binary trees but struggles with balanced tree concepts like AVL and Red-Black trees.

topics.name: Graph
topics.description: Has trouble with DFS but understands basic graph structures and BFS.

topics.name: Hashing
topics.description: Good understanding of hash maps and collision resolution techniques but struggles with designing hash functions.

topics.name: Sorting Algorithms
topics.description: Understands bubble sort and quick sort but has trouble with merge sort and heap sort.

topics.name: Dynamic Programming
topics.description: Understands basic concepts like memoization but struggles with complex multi-dimensional DP problems.
